0.0.1.name: PythonBrasil
0.0.1.about: A community is formed by people with something in common. PythonBrasil community has been a group of buoyant developers and sparkling newbies from Delhi NCR who love Python. PythonBrasil provides a place where not just the code but community matters. A community which runs because of efforts put in by the ones wanting to keep Python and developer circles alive. We're enthralled to have you as a part of us.
